Key Match Events: Aaron Wiggins recorded 19 points, 5 rebounds, and 2 blocks in 25 minutes off the bench, contributing 15 points in the fourth quarter.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 33 points, 4 rebounds, and 7 assists.
The Thunder outscored the Knicks 37-19 in the fourth quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: Isaiah Hartenstein praised Wiggins for his performance, noting Sam Presti's ability to develop talented players.
Gilgeous-Alexander stated that Jalen Williams is an All-Star caliber player, implying he believes Williams will make the All-Star team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wiggins' performance came on his mother's birthday.
Williams is averaging a career-high 20.9 points per game with 5.8 rebounds, 5.2 assists, and 1.8 steals.
